title: Prescriptive Dashboard-Enhanced Mathematics Learning Design to Improve Online Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Knowledge and Digital Device Usage Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with advanced mathematical expertise, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessment. Digital devices are provided, and they complete a non-degree course

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three personalized learning patterns by analyzing data from a prescriptive dashboard.
Learners can establish and execute a weekly learning plan with over 80% adherence using dashboard feedback.
Learners can present case studies demonstrating the application of dashboard analysis results to actual learning strategies through project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
